mapper.select: select `log`.`id`, `log`.`suite_id`, `log`.`suite_log_no`, `log`.`run_time`, `log`.`total_run_case`, `log`.`total_case`,`log`.`total_skip`,`log`.`execute_type`,`log`.`run_dev`, `log`.`total_success`, `log`.`total_failed`, `log`.`total_error`, `log`.`start_time`, `log`.`end_time`, `suite`.`suite_name`, `suite`.`desc` as `suite_desc` from `t_interface_suite_log` as `log` LEFT JOIN `t_interface_case_suite` as `suite` on `log`.`suite_id` = `suite`.`suite_id` where `log`.`suite_log_no`=#{suiteLogNo}

select `log`.`id`, `log`.`suite_id`, `log`.`suite_log_no`, `log`.`run_time`, `log`.`total_run_case`, `log`.`total_case`,`log`.`total_skip`,`log`.`execute_type`,`log`.`run_dev`, `log`.`total_success`, `log`.`total_failed`, `log`.`total_error`, `log`.`start_time`, `log`.`end_time`, `suite`.`suite_name`, `suite`.`desc` as `suite_desc` from `t_interface_suite_log` as `log` LEFT JOIN `t_interface_case_suite` as `suite` on `log`.`suite_id` = `suite`.`suite_id` where `log`.`id`=#{id}
